question: RBI would purchase four government securities amounting Rs.20,000 crore through which operation?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is set to purchase four government securities (G-Secs) amounting Rs.20,000 crore under the Open Market Operations (OMO).
The motive behind this move is to bring down the yield on securities, that has reached a intra-day high of 6.1634% recently.
